meanings.sent1: The prepaid phone card allowed me to make calls before paying.
meanings.sent2: She bought a prepaid gift card for her friend's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The prepaid ticket to the concert saved me from waiting in line.
meanings.sent4: His prepaid membership gave him access to exclusive events.
meanings.sent5: The prepaid hotel reservation ensured a stress-free vacation.

meanings.definition: To pay for something before it is received
meanings.sent1: I prepaid for my meal at the restaurant to avoid waiting for the bill.
meanings.sent2: They prepaid the rent for the apartment before moving in.
meanings.sent3: He prepaid for the movie tickets online to secure good seats.
meanings.sent4: She prepaid for the online course to start learning immediately.
meanings.sent5: We prepaid for the concert tickets to guarantee our attendance.
